text.tspan: - red arrows are disk I/O, blue arrows network I/O, black arrows internal memory
- module servers may run on any host, duplicates for the same module allow for load-balancing
- server list must be on a shared partition (NFS for instance) and accessible to all
- multiple correctors may run at the same time, drawing from the same pool of servers
- output is FoLiA XML with suggestions for correction
- Gecco is written in Python 3, but modules bind with mostly C++ code for performance
GECCO - Generic Environment for Context-aware Correction of Orthography
